Author: Moderator
Message: Welcome LloydTheDude

Author: Moderator
Message: Thank you for participating in this study.

Author: LloydTheDude
Message: Hello!

Author: LloydTheDude
Message: You're welcome

Author: Moderator
Message: In the next posts, I'll be going over the rules of the "game" you're about to play.

Author: Moderator
Message: Once I'll be done, I'll ask you if you've understood the rules, and if you haven't I'll explain them in different words.

Author: Moderator
Message: You're about to talk to Andrew. Andrew is a fictive character that has been completely created for the purpose of this study.

Author: Moderator
Message: You'll be talking to him twice.

Author: Moderator
Message: The only difference between the two conversations you'll have with him, is that in one of them Andrew will be played by a real human.

Author: Moderator
Message: In the other, it will be played by an Artificial Intelligence we are developing.

Author: Moderator
Message: We will call the Human and the Artificial Intelligence the Actors.

Author: Moderator
Message: The order in which you'll be talking to each Actor is random.

Author: Moderator
Message: You will not be talking twice with the same Actor.

Author: Moderator
Message: Both the Artificial Intelligence and the Human will try to portray the same Andrew in the most convincing way they can.

Author: Moderator
Message: Your goal is simple. After talking to the two actors, you'll have to guess which one was the Artificial Intelligence and which one was the Human.

Author: Moderator
Message: Whenever you have made your decision, you are able to stop the conversation.

Author: Moderator
Message: Each conversation will last for 15 minutes maximum if you do not decide to stop it before.

Author: Moderator
Message: Please, keep your posts to text only (No smileys, no links... etc)

Author: Moderator
Message: Do not type more than one post per answer.

Author: Moderator
Message: Do you understand the rules and what you have to do?

Author: LloydTheDude
Message: Yes I do.

Author: Moderator
Message: Good. Andrew will start the conversation. The 15 minutes will start after your answer. Are you ready?

Author: LloydTheDude
Message: Yes!

Author: Andrew
Message: Hello!

Author: LloydTheDude
Message: Hi there! Are you Andrew?

Author: Andrew
Message: Well yes! How are you doing?

Author: LloydTheDude
Message: I'm doing quite well, thank you for asking. How about yourself?

Author: Andrew
Message: I'm doing quite alright thanks! What are you up to?

Author: LloydTheDude
Message: I was just playing some Overwatch on my PS4. Now I'm thinking about a movie. Doing anything exciting yourself today?

Author: Andrew
Message: Kind of. I've been playing a bit of Minecraft. I've never touched Overwatch yet, is it on PC?

Author: LloydTheDude
Message: It is, but I don't have a PC. Do you play anything else?

Author: Andrew
Message: I mostly just play Minecraft, but lately I've been very much into Mass Effect too.

Author: LloydTheDude
Message: Andromeda? I heard it got some bad reviews.

Author: Andrew
Message: It definitely did. It's still a pretty good game in my opinion. They just need to fix all the glitches and various weirdness.

Author: LloydTheDude
Message: I'm going to wait til next year before I buy it; give them ample chance to fix it.

Author: Andrew
Message: That's probably a very good idea yeah.

Author: LloydTheDude
Message: So what else do you do for fun, Andrew?

Author: Andrew
Message: I mostly just play games honestly. What about you?

Author: LloydTheDude
Message: The same frankly. I watch some TV too, mostly science-fiction.

Author: Andrew
Message: Oh yeah. I do that too. I don't know of many good Sci-Fi TV shows though.

Author: LloydTheDude
Message: What do you watch?

Author: Andrew
Message: Game of Thrones and shows like that. I'm eagerly waiting for the next season.

Author: LloydTheDude
Message: What are your predictions for what will happen?

Author: Andrew
Message: In what way?

Author: LloydTheDude
Message: Well with the characters, do you predict any big fights or drama between anyone?

Author: Andrew
Message: I'm sure there will definitely be some fighting going on yeah.

Author: LloydTheDude
Message: Do you think Cersei will survive the season?

Author: Andrew
Message: I'm not sure. I could see her die very early in the new season, or in the 9th episode. I don't think she'll be in the final season though, and if she is, not for long.

Author: LloydTheDude
Message: Who do you think will kill her?

Author: Andrew
Message: I'm not really sure to be honest.

Author: LloydTheDude
Message: I think I've got enough from this Andrew.

Author: Moderator
Message: Conversation interrupted!

Author: Moderator
Message: Which actor do you think you've been talking to (This is not your final answer)

Author: LloydTheDude
Message: I think that was the AI.

Author: Moderator
Message: Alright. We'll start the next conversation. Andrew will begin and then you'll have 15 minutes after your answer. Are you ready?

Author: LloydTheDude
Message: Yes

Author: Andrew
Message: Hello!

Author: LloydTheDude
Message: Hi Andrew, how's it going buddy?

Author: Andrew
Message: It's going alright! What about you?

Author: LloydTheDude
Message: Not too bad, thank you. Been doing anything cool today?

Author: Andrew
Message: Not a whole lot. Mostly playing games actually. You?

Author: LloydTheDude
Message: Much of the same. Playing anything good?

Author: Andrew
Message: Mostly Minecraft actually. Although I've been very much into Mass Effect lately.

Author: LloydTheDude
Message: How are you finding Mass Effect?

Author: Andrew
Message: Andromeda? It's quite good honestly. I've spent so much time on it. The glitches and lack of good facial animations are really annoying though. But they are trying to fix that.

Author: LloydTheDude
Message: I heard as much, gonna be a while before I buy it though. Do much else when you're not playing games?

Author: Andrew
Message: Other than that I'm mostly working on college stuff.

Author: LloydTheDude
Message: What are you studying for?

Author: Andrew
Message: I'm an undergrad. I study Biology. Are you in college too?

Author: LloydTheDude
Message: I was, but that was a couple of years ago now. I was studying Linguistics.

Author: Andrew
Message: That is pretty cool actually. What do you do now?

Author: LloydTheDude
Message: I work in a call centre; I help business clients manage their energy and utility consumption.

Author: Andrew
Message: That is quite different.

Author: LloydTheDude
Message: Yeah, not many jobs in a lot of graduate fields these days.

Author: Andrew
Message: Yeah that's quite a shame. In which country do you live?

Author: LloydTheDude
Message: I'm from England. Can't say I'm proud of that but it is what it is.

Author: Andrew
Message: Why wouldn't you be proud of it?

Author: LloydTheDude
Message: It's a country of morons and narcissists and closet racists.

Author: Andrew
Message: Well, I'm sure the French would agree, but I'm sure not everyone is like that. I mean, you're not so...

Author: LloydTheDude
Message: I think I've got enough from this Andrew.
